structure.unit: PAYMENT, COLLECTION, AND REFUND OF TAXES

law.catch_line: County clerk to collect ad valorem taxes on motorboats.
law.text: The collection of ad valorem taxes on motorboats shall be administered in the same manner and according to the same procedures provided for motor vehicles in KRS 134.800 to 134.820.
law.history: Created 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 163, sec. 2, effective January 1, 1990.
